    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>9381</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Homonyms Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre homónimos</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist faoi Chomhainmneacha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Homonym-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu d'Homonymes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Dos Homonyms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz Degli Omonimi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων ομωνύμων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Children will have a bettere understanding of what homonyms are.</string>
            <string language="es">Los niños entenderán mejor el concepto de homónimos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Beidh tuiscint níos fearr ag na leanaí ar chéard is comhainmneacha ann.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinder haben ein bettere Verständnis von, was 
Homonyme sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les enfants auront un arrangement de bettere de 
ce que sont les homonymes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As crianças terão uma compreensão do bettere 
de o que os homonyms são.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I bambini avranno una comprensione del bettere di
che cosa gli omonimi sono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα παιδιά θα έχουν μια κατανόηση bettere αυτά που 
τα ομώνυμα είναι.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
